item.title: AWS Certified ML - Specialty exam (MLS-C01) - Modeling
item.description:
Modeling

  1. Introduction to Deep Learning
  2. Activation Functions
  3. Convolutional Neural Network
  4. Recurrent Neural Networks
  5. Modern NLP with BERT and GPT, and Transfer Learning
  6. Deep Learning on EC2 and EMR
  7. Tuning Neural Networks
  8. Regularization Techniques for Neural Networks (Dropout, Early Stopping)
  9. L1 and L2 Regularization
  10. Grief with Gradients The Vanishing Gradient problem
  11. The Confusion Matrix
  12. Precision, Recall, F1, AUC, and more
  13. Ensemble Methods Bagging and Boosting
  14. Introducing Amazon SageMaker
  15. Linear Learner in SageMaker
  16. XGBoost in SageMaker
  17. Seq2Seq in SageMaker
  18. DeepAR in SageMaker
  19. BlazingText in SageMaker
  20. Object2Vec in SageMaker
  21. Object Detection in SageMaker
  22. Image Classification in SageMaker
  23. Semantic Segmentation in SageMaker
  24. Random Cut Forest in SageMaker
  25. Neural Topic Model in SageMaker
  26. Latent Dirichlet Allocation (LDA) in SageMaker
  27. K-Nearest-Neighbors (KNN) in SageMaker
  28. K-Means Clustering in SageMaker
  29. Principal Component Analysis (PCA) in SageMaker
  30. Factorization Machines in SageMaker
  31. IP Insights in SageMaker
  32. Reinforcement Learning in SageMaker
  33. Automatic Model Tuning
  34. Apache Spark with SageMaker
  35. SageMaker Studio, and SageMaker Experiments
  36. SageMaker Debugger
  37. SageMaker Autopilot / AutoML
  38. SageMaker Model Monitor
  39. Other recent features (JumpStart, Data Wrangler, Features Store, Edge Manager)
  40. SageMaker Canvas
  41. Bias Measures in SageMaker Canvas
  42. SageMaker Training Compiler
  43. Amazon Comprehend
  44. Amazon Translate
  45. Amazon Transcribe
  46. Amazon Polly
  47. Amazon Rekognition
  48. Amazon Forecast
  49. Amazon Forecast Algorithms
  50. Amazon Lex
  51. Amazon Personalize
  52. Lightning round! TexTract, DeepLens, DeepRacher, Lookout, and Monitron
  53. TorchServe, AWS Neuron, and AWS Panorama
  54. Deep Composer, Fraud Detection, CodeGuru, and Contact Lens
  55. Amazon Kendra and Amazon Augmented AI (A2I)
